ProductInfo.Features:
1) Quad band, Network: GSM850/ 900 / 1800/ 1900MHZ 2) Single SIM Card Single Standby 3) Display Size: 1.6 inch TFT touch screen 4) Ringtones Type: Polyphonic / MP3
5) Audio File format: MP3 / MIDI 6) Video File format: 3GP / MPEG4 (AVI) 7) Image File format: JPEG, BMP, GIF 8) E-book format: TXT
9) Support JAVA 2.0, MSN, QQ , Sound Record / Video Record 10) Data Transfer: USB / Bluetooth 11) Input: Handwriting 12) 1.3 Mega pixel camera
13) Connectivity: GPRS / WAP 14) Messaging: SMS / MMS 15) Built in 1016.5KB memory, Support TF Card, Max 4GB. 16) Languages (option): English, Russian, Turkish, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Greek, Norwegian
17) Other function: Calendar, Alarm, Calculator, E-book reader, Task 18) Battery: 3.7V/500mAh Li-ion Battery 19) Dimension: 48x48x17mm 20) Weight: 163g (including battery)
ProductInfo.Name: Generic F6 Red, Compass Watch Phone with Camera, Bluetooth / FM Radio, 1.8 inch Touch Screen Phone, Single SIM Card, Quad band, Network: GSM850/900/1800/1900MHz
